thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superlative
thread.title_full: Superlative - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: clhh
title: Superlative
text: The St James' Court Taj Hotel in London provided us with a home away from home. The lobby is gracious and welcoming. The room was comfortable and clean. The breakfast is scrumptious and provide both quantity and quality. The staff is, without exception, knowledgeable, friendly, and thoughtful. This hotel set the stage for a beautiful experience in an exciting city.
